blockstacksso-desc: Allow users to login with a Blockstack account
blockstacksso-form-merge: The Blockstack account '''$1''' is not linked to any user in this wiki. Please enter the credentials of an existing account to link your Blockstack ID to.
blockstacksso-unlink-first: This wiki account is already linked to the blockstack ID '''$1''', please unlink it first, or select a different account.
blockstacksso-error-no-authentication-wo: You requested to continue an already started Blockstack authentication workflow, but there's no one that is already started. Please start a new authentication workflow by trying to login again.
blockstacksso-loginbutton-help: Authenticates you with your Blockstack account.
blockstacksso-link-help: Link your wiki account with your Blockstack account.
